message: Hi, Here are some Resources that Benjamin from Couchbase (@bigbluehat) provided for couchDB:

Installation Options:
  Couchbase Single Server 2.0
  http://www.couchbase.com/downloads/couchbase-server/community

  Iris Couch - hosted CouchDB
  http://iriscouch.com/

  Cloudant - hosted BigCouch
  https://cloudant.com/

  From source or package managers:
  http://wiki.apache.org/couchdb/Installation

Books:
  CouchDB: The Definitive Guide (open source book)
  http://guide.couchdb.org/

  Writing and Querying MapReduce Views in CouchDB
  http://oreilly.com/catalog/9781449303129/

  Scaling CouchDB
  http://bradley-holt.com/2011/03/scaling-couchdb/
We're going to setup BigCouch on one of the nodes, working on it!
